axes.description: Used to specify the axes affected by this modifier.
axes.markdownDescription: Used to specify the axes affected by this modifier.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will apply to velocity in the specified axes.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will apply to velocity in the specified axes.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the specified axes.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the specified axes.
